channel.title: The Hollywood Reporter on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Hollywood Reporter on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Shirley Halperin Joins Rolling Stone as Co-Editor-in-Chief; Maer Roshan Becomes Sole EIC at The Hollywood Reporter
item.description: Halperin becomes the first woman to lead the venerable music brand; Roshan will direct editorial strategy for THR’s print magazine, digital and social platforms and its expansion into audio and video.

item.title: Shirley Halperin Joins Rolling Stone as Co-Editor-in-Chief; Maer Roshan Becomes Sole EIC at The Hollywood Reporter
item.description: Halperin becomes the first woman to lead the venerable music brand; Roshan will direct editorial strategy for THR’s print magazine, digital and social platforms and its expansion into audio and video.
